column4: How do i reset my top menubar to the default..? i've accidently deleted the chat client  etc and everytime i restart the computer i have to reload gwibber and empathy etc etc
Just add that applet back to the panel.  You don't necessarily have to reset the whole thing!

All of your settings for every app are saved in hidden .<name> folders in your home directory. You can see the using nautilus with hidden files turned on or the cli using ls -a  .  Figuring out which folder that setting is in is the tricky part.
Or nevermind cause you fixed it
